naslov: Prodaje se lijepa velika samostojna kuća na Pelješcu, u Tomislavcu! (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se lijepa velika samostojna kuća na Pelješcu, u Tomislavcu. Kući pripada i garaža ispred kuće, mali objekat ljetne kuhinje iza kuće te terase i dvorište oko kuće. Kuća se sastoji od dnevnog boravka, blagovaonice, kuhinje, kupaonice i spreme u prizemlju te sa po tri spavaće sobe na prvom i drugom katu. Objekat ima dosta potencijala, nalazi se na lijepom izdignutom mjestu sa prelijepim panoramskim pogledom. Kuću je potrebno renovirati. Postoji opcija dokupa dva manja objekta u blizini ove nekretnine koji bi se mogli prilagoditi u apartmane za goste. Sve dodatne informacije u Agenciji DMP. --- A nice large detached house for sale in Pelješac, in Tomislavac. The house also has a garage in front of the house, a small summer kitchen facility behind the house, and a terrace and yard around the house. The house consists of a living room, dining room, kitchen, bathroom and utility room on the ground floor and three bedrooms on the first and three bedrooms on the second floor. The building has a lot of potential, it is located on a nice elevated spot with a beautiful panoramic view. The house needs to be renovated. There is an option to purchase two smaller buildings near this property that could be adapted into apartments for guests. All additional information in the DMP Agency.
